title: Lucid Watch Face

description: Designed for round displays, Lucid Watch Face is a no nonsense face made for times when you feel like going with an elegant, modern and a sharp looking watch face that won't be too overwhelming for certain outfits and at the same showing all the information one would need for daily use in an elegant way.Features :- - Change watch face color to blue, yellow, orange, red, green, pink & purple - Watch battery percentage  - Phone battery percentage - Date of the month - Month of the year - Day of the week - A digital 24 hour clock with a graphic indicator showing how much of the day is left / spent.  - Change watch face color from the handheld - Weather coming soon.... Lucid watch face!
descriptionHTML:
Designed for round displays, Lucid Watch Face is a no nonsense face made for times when you feel like going with an elegant, modern and a sharp looking watch face that won't be too overwhelming for certain outfits and at the same showing all the information one would need for daily use in an elegant way.

Features :-
- Change watch face color to blue, yellow, orange, red, green, pink & purple
- Watch battery percentage
- Phone battery percentage
- Date of the month
- Month of the year
- Day of the week
- A digital 24 hour clock with a graphic indicator showing how much of the day is left / spent.
- Change watch face color from the handheld
- Weather coming soon....

Lucid watch face!
recentChanges: - Fixed a bug due to which the inner information sections appeared small on some watches.
